remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會解密加密的訊息建立使用多載相同的簽章。This method decrypts an encrypted message created using the overload with the same signature.

summary.span: Creates a symmetric AES decryptor object with the specified key and initialization vector (IV).

span.span: Creates a symmetric AES decryptor object with the specified key and initialization vector (IV).
A symmetric AES decryptor object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會解密加密的訊息建立使用多載相同的簽章。This method decrypts an encrypted message created using the overload with the same signature. > [!NOTE] > 如果您已建立物件使用的現有保存索引鍵和您想要使用的金鑰解密訊息時，您想要設定屬性並無參數然後呼叫相反地，否則多載使用這個方法會建立暫時的金鑰所指定`rgbKey`參數。If you've created the object using an existing persisted key and you want to make use of that key when decrypting the message, you want to set the property and then call the parameterless overload instead; otherwise, using this method will create an ephemeral key as specified by the `rgbKey` parameter.

exception.span: -or- size does not match the block size for this algorithm.

-or- is .

A symmetric AES encryptor object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個方法來加密訊息，然後使用多載相同的簽章來解密此方法的結果。Use this method to encrypt a message and then use the overload with the same signature to decrypt the result of this method. > [!NOTE] > 如果您已建立物件使用的現有保存索引鍵和您想要使用的金鑰加密的訊息時，您想要設定屬性並無參數然後呼叫相反地，否則多載使用這個方法會建立暫時的金鑰所指定`rgbKey`參數。If you've created the object using an existing persisted key and you want to make use of that key when encrypting the message, you want to set the property and then call the parameterless overload instead; otherwise, using this method will create an ephemeral key as specified by the `rgbKey` parameter.

member this.Key : byte[] with get, set

summary.span: Gets or sets the key for the algorithm.

span.span: Gets or sets the key for the algorithm.
The key for the algorithm.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您已建立物件使用的現有保存金鑰，當您讀取的值時屬性將進行嘗試匯出金鑰。If you've created the object using an existing persisted key, when you read the value of the property, an attempt to export the key will be made. 在此情況下，如果索引鍵不是可匯出、就會擲回。In this case, if the key is not exportable, a will be thrown. 除了，如果您設定的值屬性，將無法再使用保存的金鑰和將改為使用暫存索引鍵。In addition to that, if you set the value of the property, the persisted key will no longer be used and a temporary key will be used instead. 如果您需要使用一次，持續性索引鍵的新執行個體必須先建立類別。If you need to use the persisted key again, a new instance of class needs to be created.

MemberSignature.Value: public override int KeySize { get; set; }
.property instance int32 KeySize
Public Overrides Property KeySize As Integer
public: virtual property int KeySize { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.KeySize : int with get, set

summary.span: Gets or sets the size, in bits, of the secret key used by the algorithm.

span.span: Gets or sets the size, in bits, of the secret key used by the algorithm.

value.span: 演算法使用之祕密金鑰的大小 (以位元為單位)。

span.span: The size, in bits, of the secret key used by the algorithm.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您已建立物件使用的現有保存金鑰和設定的值屬性，將無法再使用保存的金鑰和暫時的金鑰將改為使用。If you've created the object using an existing persisted key and you set the value of the property, the persisted key will no longer be used and an ephemeral key will be used instead. 如果您需要使用一次，持續性索引鍵的新執行個體必須先建立類別。If you need to use the persisted key again, a new instance of class needs to be created.
